item.description: Music mogul Sean "Diddy" Combs' federal sex trafficking and racketeering trial is underway in New York City.

item.title: U.S. and China agree to major 90-day easing of tariffs as talks progress
item.description: The White House says the U.S. and China have agreed to suspend for 90 days most of the tariffs imposed against each other over the last couple months.

item.title: More equipment outages at Newark airport
item.description: There have been more traffic equipment outages at Newark Liberty International Airport that continue causing delays and cancellations. CBS News' Kris ...

item.title: Stocks rally after news of U.S. - China agreement to ease tariffs
item.description: Stocks soared Monday morning, with news of a U.S. - China tariff deal buoying investor confidence.

item.title: Apr 7: CBS News 24/7, 10am ET
item.description: Stocks on Wall Street down after market open amid tariff anxiety; Alex Ovechkin breaks Wayne Gretzky's NHL goals record with 895th of his career.
